mapper.select: SELECT reservestatus, reserveinfo_num,reserveinfo.onedayclass_num,openday,reserve_img , openday, merchant_uid,user.user_name ,user.user_tell ,onedayclass.onedayclass_price ,onedayclass.onedayclass_name,application_day from reserveinfo INNER JOIN user on reserveinfo.user_code=user.user_code INNER JOIN onedayclass ON reserveinfo.onedayclass_num=onedayclass.onedayclass_num WHERE user.user_code=#{user_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE reserveinfo SET reservestatus='paycancel' WHERE reserveinfo_num=#{reserveinfo_num}
